EmailTemplate.name: Dance Academy information
EmailTemplate.subject: BSG's Dance Academy Begins This Weekend.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
BSG's weekend Dance Academy will commence Term 2's schedule of classes this weekend.
Please click here to view details of available classes for both children and adults or contact Kate directly at kate.stephenson@bsg.org.cn for further information.
If you or your child would like to enrol please turn up for registration at the school tomorrow at 3pm or Sunday at 1pm.
Kind Regards,
Miss Kate Stephenson
Head of Primary PE
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Member of The British Schools Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International School of South East Asia - Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
